00031 class KGLParticle
00032 {
00033     public:
00034         KGLParticle();
00035         void init();
00036         void move();
00037         
00038         void reset()
00039         {
00040             m_alpha=m_initAlpha;
00041             m_pos=m_initPos;
00042             m_col=m_initCol;
00043         }
00044 
00045         void setColor(const QColor &col)
00046         {
00047             m_col = col; m_initCol=col;
00048         }
00049 
00050         void setColorStep(const QColor &c)
00051         {
00052             m_colStep = c;
00053         }
00054 
00055         void setPosition(const QPointF &p)
00056         {
00057             m_pos = p;m_initPos=p;
00058         }
00059 
00060         void setInitPosition(const QPointF &p)
00061         {
00062             m_initPos = p;
00063         }
00064 
00065         void setDirection (const QPointF &d)
00066         {
00067             m_direction = d;
00068         }
00069 
00070         void setSpeed(const float &s)
00071         {
00072             m_speed = s;
00073         }
00074

00076         {
00077             m_size =s;
00078         }
00079 
00080         void setAlpha(const float &a)
00081         {
00082             m_alpha = a;
00083         }
00084 
00085         void setAlphaStep(const float &s)
00086         {
00087             m_alphaStep = s;
00088         }
00089 
00090         void setTexture(const QString& name)
00091         {
00092             m_tex = new KGLTexture(name);
00093         }
00094 
00095         void setTexture(const QPixmap& name)
00096         {
00097             m_tex = new KGLTexture(name);
00098         }
00099 
00100         void setTexture(KGLTexture * t)
00101         {
00102             m_tex = t;
00103         }
00104 
00105         const QPointF& position()
00106         {
00107             return m_pos;
00108         }
00109

00111         {
00112             return m_size;
00113         }

00118         }

00123         }

00128         }

00133         }

00139

00158 class KGLParticlesItem: public KGLItem
00159 {
00160     public:
00161         KGLParticlesItem(KGLEngine * parent=0);
00162         virtual void draw();
00163 
00164         void addParticles(KGLParticle * p)
00165         {
00166             m_particles.append(p);
00167         }
00168 
00169         QList<KGLParticle*> particles()
00170         {
00171             return m_particles;
00172         }
00173         void createExplose(unsigned int number,QPixmap texture,const double angle=360, float speed=0.01, float alphaStep=0.01,float size=10);
00174         void createSmoke(unsigned int number,QPixmap texture,const double angle=360, float speed=0.01, float alphaStep=0.01,float size=10);
00175 
00176     private:
00177         QList <KGLParticle*> m_particles;
00178 };
